description: This file defines a React custom hook 'useGridState' that manages the state of a grid layout configuration. It includes state persistence via sessionStorage, derived styling with useMemo, and functions to update various grid parameters such as columns, gap, row height, and toggle responsive and guide display flags.

methods.name: useGridState(initialConfig = DEFAULT_GRID_CONFIG)
methods.description: Custom React hook to manage grid layout settings, with persistence and bounds checking.
